attributes.action: revoke the £165m contract awarded to ETS for the marking and administration of SATs examinations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parents, teachers and pupils have collectively lost confidence in the system. Delays and the huge number of complaints relating to the quality of the marking demonstrate that the choice of ETS was inappropriate. The experience further brings into question whether appropriate due diligence was applied and suggests that the selection process should also be subject to review.
